item.title: Virtual reality, cryotherapy chamber highlights new tech Saints use during training camp
item.description:
Virtual reality, cryotherapy chamber highlights new tech Saints use during training camp

From sub-zero temperatures to virtual reality headsets - nothing is off-limits when it pertains to training the future players of the New Orleans Saints. The team is apparently implementing the use of cryo-technology and 3D virtual reality cameras for on and off the field purposes.

item.title: Impact Cryotherapy Announces Sports Medicine Leader James R. Andrews, M.D. as Chair of New National Advisory Board
item.description:
Impact Cryotherapy Announces Sports Medicine Leader James R. Andrews, M.D. as Chair of New National Advisory Board

Impact Cryotherapy Announces Sports Medicine Leader James R. Andrews, M.D. as Chair of New National Advisory Board Impact Cryotherapy announced today that James R. Andrews, M.D., a globally recognized leader in sports medicine and orthopaedics, will chair its new National Advisory Board, and that Troy C. Van Biezen, D.C., A.R.T.
